title: Coronavirus: WHO Official Floats Removing the Infected from Their Homes to Stop Spread
description: Dr. Michael Ryan, executive director of the World Health Organization's Health Emergencies Program, suggested during a March 30 press conference that individuals infected with the Chinese coronavirus should be removed from their homes to prevent the spread of…
content: Dr. Michael Ryan, executive director of the World Health Organization’s Health Emergencies Program, suggested during a March 30 press conference that individuals infected with the Chinese coronavirus should be removed from their homes to prevent further sprea… [+4098 chars]
